dublin_core.dcvalue: The increasing level of country interest in OpenLMIS requires evolution to an applicationarchitecture that supports the ability to add to or modify the software and contributethose changes back to the project Participants in this session will engage in a hands onscenario to better convey the meaning behind the modular architecture of OpenLMISversion 3 0 Participants will work with interactive pieces of a real world use case identifying requirements and challenges and matching features and functionality in thetool to those needs Using participants identification of priorities and features workshopfacilitators will then moderate a discussion on how OpenLMIS flexible modulararchitecture can provide the best solution not just for that particular use case but for theshared benefit of other LMICs with similar priorities Presented by Tenly Snow OpenLMIS Community Manager Information Systems Village Reach
